name: Discoveryland Kids Church
description: Join in the fun as we learn about God and His Word each week! For children age 3 to Grade 6, every Sunday at 9:30 AM (September through June).

name: Community Groups
description: Join us each week as we gather with friends to study God's Word. A time of connecting with others and growing in Christ. Contact Lorne @ 371-9514 for more info.

name: Junior Youth
description: For grades 7-9. We have fun, worship, memorize scripture, talk about how God is changing our lives and serve our local community through food drives and local service projects.

name: Senior Youth
description: For grades 10-12. Meet weekly for Small Groups, Worship night, or Gym night. Come check it out!

name: Ladies Connect Bible Study
description: Are you looking for a place to unwind over a cup of coffee with friends and discuss God's Word? Come out to our Friday morning Women's Bible Study.

name: Sonrise Servants - Men's Prayer
description: All men welcome! Come out each Friday to pray, encourage one another, and fellowship in the upstairs boardroom at GALF. Contact Dan @ 371-0124 for more info.

name: Outreach
description: We believe in making a difference at home and in our local cities through ministering at seniors' homes, helping the local food bank, and evangelism. Contact George @ 371-7544.

name: Good News Daycare
description: Supporting families and nurturing children in God's Word. Contact goodnewsdaycare@gmail.com for more information.

name: Grunthal Christian Preschool
description: Supporting families and nurturing children in God's Word through early childhood education.
